remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlDbTypeExtensions> class provides <xref:System.Data.SqlDbType> enums which will be added. These are meant to be used by applications which cannot leverage the enums in <xref:System.Data.SqlDbType> available in newer .NET runtime versions.

SqlJson.name: default
SqlJson.summary: Gets the enum value for the JSON datatype.
